name: artifactory
description: As the first, and only, universal Artifact Repository Manager on the market, JFrog Artifactory fully supports software packages created by any language or technology.
preInstallNotes: Documentation is available at: https://github.com/JFrogDev/artifactory-dcos. Both Artifactory Pro and HA require a MySQL database to be configured, please see the documentation for requirements. If you wish to use Artifactory High Availability, you need to ensure the `cluster-home` directory is visible and writable to all the Artifactory cluster nodes in your system (e.g. using NFS storage).
postUninstallNotes: Artifactory has been uninstalled. Note that any data persisted to a NFS share still exists and will need to be manually removed.
